inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: refractory arterial hypotension or hypoperfusion abnormalities

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no other cardiovascular risk factors such as diabetes mellitus

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: systolic murmur 3+/6+ in the neck, radiating to the skull

exclusion.criterion: severe dementia, psychiatric or neuromuscular disability
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: acute coronary syndrome within one previous week
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: The patient reported no use of lipid-lowering medications

exclusion.criterion: respiratory distress ARDS with arterial oxygenation less than 70mm Hg or the FiO2 / PaO2 ratio < 200
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery. He also has a systolic murmur in the neck.
